definition: to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes/to take sb down with oneself/to end in mutual destruction
like/same/similar/together/alike/with
surname Gui

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
(literary) Oh!/Ah!
in/at/to/from/by/than/out of
surname Yu/Taiwan pr. [Yu2]
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely

sentences.english: We are moving to replace mutually assured destruction with mutual cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在採取行動，以共同合作代替同歸於盡。

sentences.english: This well where drank so many of the dead was destined to die itself.
sentences.chinese: 這口被許多死人喝過水的井也該同歸於盡。

sentences.english: Finally, in order to protect her Wolf sun, end up with golden eagles.
sentences.chinese: 最後，她爲了保護自己的狼孫，與金雕同歸於盡了。

sentences.english: Buha by the go, just want to die and come to a boar's.
sentences.chinese: 布哈依這次去，就是想和公豬來個同歸於盡的。

sentences.english: Third, they would attack their adversaries, smear them and threaten to drag them down with them.
sentences.chinese: 第三步則是反咬對手，抹黑大家，威脅一起同歸於盡。

sentences.english: Tarkin never returned, having died in the explosion that consumed the Death Star.
sentences.chinese: 塔金再也沒有回來，他和死星在爆炸中同歸於盡。

definition: to bear grudges
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
to come to blows/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
to throw one's life in for/to haplessly give one's life for/to sacrifice oneself torturously working for another or for a group/to pour in one's utmost effort/to shed one's last ounce of strength for
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
the trick of injuring oneself to gain the enemy's confidence/CL:條|条[tiao2]
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
idle gossip
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
red in the face/extremely angry
to plot and kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
to view death as a return home/to not be afraid of dying/to face death with equanimity (idiom)
lit. dumb as a wooden chicken (idiom); fig. dumbstruck
variant of 小題大做|小题大做[xiao3 ti2 da4 zuo4]
calm and composed (idiom)
